description: This tasty Salad can be eaten hot or cold and guaranteed to please everyone!
name: Roasted Pumpkin, Spinach And Cashew Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g cashews cut, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and core pumpkin, cut into bite size pieces. Wash cauliflower and cut into small pieces about the same size as the Pumpkin. Place in a bowl, toss with olive oil, salt and garlic powder Bake cauliflower and pumpkin for 25 minutes at 180 degrees If using chicken wrap in aluminium foil and cook with the veggies

While veggies are cooking. Place the spinach in a bowl. Cut the sundried tomatoes in half or thirds and add to spinach. Lightly toast the cashews until just a little brown and smelling nutty. Mix together the balsamic and the honey
Allow the pumpkin, cauliflower, chicken and nuts to cool then add to the Spinach mix along with the sundried tomatoes.

Add the balsamic vinegar dressing and gently toss the salad, Cut or break the fetta into small pieces and add. Do this last and only toss very gently so that the fetta is just combined as will break down and make the salad 'Muddy'
